Pyth
  • Docs »
  • Welcome to Pyth’s documentation!
  • View page source

Welcome to Pyth’s documentation!¶

Pyth is an extremely concise language used for golfing. Try it here at: https://pyth.herokuapp.com. This is a tutorial/documentation/language-specification for it.
